name: Simple Facebook 2017
description: A simple, clean and functional Facebook theme, which utilities elements of one my favourite themes. Please note, default font for this style (as visible in the screenshot) is 'PT Sans'. You can download it and install it for free from here.
additional_info: Based off the following style, style 60034, which I loved but which unfortunately broke over time due to Facebook code changes and has since been removed from the site. I fixed and stripped back the code, keeping the visual style, while removing elements which were broken and which I thought didn't work originally. I also fixed it to work across all pages, including Timeline, Pages & Events, as well as adding a few touches of my own. All credit to the original author, for his original style. Feedback welcome. Further minor fixes to pages coming shortly. 18.03.16: Minor bug fixes; replaced all non-loading images. 15.12.15: Wide variety of tweaks and fixes, including to the left navigation bar, full screen messaging, events and groups. Further minor tweaks coming to pages and timeline shortly.
